de.ityx.mediatrix.api.client

Interface ICDataHandler


  • public interface ICDataHandler
    provides functions to manage data of mediatrix
    How to use:
    on Client:
    ClientDataHandler cdh=new ClientDataHandler()
    cdh.loadProject(id)
    on Server:
    ServerDataHandler sdh=new ServerDataHandler()
    sdh.loadProject(id)

      • findTextObjects

        List<ITextObject> findTextObjects(int categoryId,
                                String text,
                                boolean fullLoad,
                                int projectId)
                                  throws Exception
        Finds text object by given parameters
        Parameters:
        categoryId - category id of text object (if set -1 =search in all categories)
        text - text of text object
        fullLoad - true if load all data from text object
        projectId - project id of text object(if set -1 =search in all projects)
        Returns:
        a list of ITextObject
        Throws:
        Exception

        List<Customer> findCustomerOR(String string,
                            String string2,
                            String email,
                            Integer integer,
                            int operatorId)
                              throws Exception
        Loads the Customers by given Parameters (Using Additional Criteria >>OR<<)
        Parameters:
        firstname - First Name
        name - Name
        email - Email
        projectId - Project id
        operatorId - not currently used
        Returns:
        a list with all Customers matching the Parameters Constraint

        Exception
